overview: The young and attractive Berliner Merle works in a chip shop in the Weddinger Kiez and has to fight again and again with all kinds of macho and questionable representatives of the opposite sex. One day she meets her avoidable dream prince, but even this appearance is deceptive. At the same time the two broke vultures and good-for-nothings Scott and Boris are up to no good in the neighborhood
title: Fritten zum Mittag
